description: Reports Mastodon version data and patch adoption

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.description: Count of patched instances running main, compared to the total instances on main.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE main = True
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Main

panels.description: Count of patched instances running on latest branch, compared to the total instances on latest branch.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Release

panels.description: Count of patched instances running on previous branch, compared to the total instances on previous branch.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Previous

panels.description: Count of active users on instances running on main and release branches, regardless of patch levels.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0 OR n_level = -1
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS active_users_sum
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Active Users, Main & Latest

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    timestamp as "Last Crawled"
FROM mastodon_domains
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 4;

panels.description: Count of distinct Mastodon versions, after various fork/meta identifiers are removed and nightly releases are normalized.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT software_version) AS unique_software_versions
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Unique Versions

targets.rawSql:
WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  SUM(active_users_monthly) as user_count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  SUM(total_users) as user_count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    active_users_monthly as "Active Users",
    software_version as "Software Version"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version NOT IN (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    COUNT(*) AS "Instances"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 10;

WITH version_matches AS (
    SELECT 
        md.software_version,
        md.total_users,
        COALESCE(ev.software_version, pv.branch) as "Branch Version"
    FROM 
        mastodon_domains md
    LEFT JOIN eol_versions ev 
        ON md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
    LEFT JOIN patch_versions pv 
        ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    WHERE 
        ev.software_version IS NOT NULL 
        OR pv.branch IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    "Branch Version",
    SUM(total_users) as "Total Users"
FROM 
    version_matches
GROUP BY 
    "Branch Version"
ORDER BY 
    "Branch Version" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_instances AS "Pending EOL",
  statistics.total_eol_instances AS "EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_mastodon_domains
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_active_main_branch_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_active_release_branch_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_active_previous_branch_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_active_pending_eol_branch_users AS "Pending EOL",
  statistics.total_active_eol_branch_users AS "EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_active_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_branch_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_branch_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_branch_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_branch_users AS "Pending EOL",
  statistics.total_eol_branch_users AS "EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_patched_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_patched_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_patched_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_patched_instances AS "Pending EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_mastodon_domains
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

panels.title: Total Mastodon Instances by Patched Release

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_active_main_patched_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_active_release_patched_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_active_previous_patched_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_active_pending_eol_patched_users AS "Pending EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_active_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

panels.title: Active Mastodon Users by Patched Release

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_patched_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_patched_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_patched_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_patched_users AS "Pending EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    full_version as "Raw Version",
    total_users AS "Total Users",
    active_users_monthly as "Active Users",
    timestamp as "Last Crawled"
FROM mastodon_domains
ORDER BY total_users DESC;

title: vmcrawl
